articles.author: Jonathan Burgos
articles.title: Malaysian Tycoon Tony Fernandes’ AirAsia To Raise Up To $604.6 Million Amid Mounting Losses - Forbes
articles.description: AirAsia Group plans to raise as much as 2.5 billion ringgit this year through borrowings and share sales to provide the loss-making carrier ample liquidity to weather the negative impact of the pandemic.
articles.content:
Tony Fernandes speaks during an interview in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on February 27, 2015. 
Charles Pertwee/Bloomberg

articles.title: Malaysian sellers listing empty food packaging for BTS’ McDonald’s meal sets for sale online as craze continues - Malay Mail
